channel.title: Censor Evading
channel.description:
I have noticed a lot of people evading the censors lately. I would just like to warn all of you that from now on evading the censor will result in an instant moderation. The only exception to this is if you have a good reason to do so. If a site normally appears as "google" when you post it, do not look for ways to get around that, the site has more than likely been censored for a good reason. Also, if you see someone evading the censor, please report it.
Edit: Do not test the patience of a moderator. Any exception to this temporary rule will be judged at the discretion of the moderator. Continual ignorance of this rule will result in a ban. The censored websites are not being added to the censor list so that you can evade them. Get with the picture or get out.

item.title: Censor Evading
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
